risks.recommendation: Immediately update the 'MarocAgency — Policy Review & Governance Procedure' to explicitly include the mandatory quarterly review schedule for all data protection and change management related policies, along with the requirement to submit evidence of these reviews to the CNDP as per Article 8.3 of the new regulation.
